elements.label: Temptation: Exemplum
elements.description: Shall I dedicate myself to stories about the Truer Places I can half glimpse through the fog of wordly misery?

elements.label: Dedication: Exemplum
elements.description: I will seek out the places where myths are truer than facts. I will experience the lessons of the Vagabond.

elements.label: Temptation: Constellate
elements.description: Should I seek that part of me that is missing?

elements.label: Dedication: Constellate
elements.description: I shall find who carries the other half of my soul, and mend our soul stitch by stitch.
